item.title: Making Rust more awesome in 2018 - My wishlist
item.description: Credits for the animated ferris/header image goes to http://www.rustacean.net/. ðŸ‘‡ is how i feel using rust in 2018 ! ðŸ˜‚ Cool; So finally got time to write this ! Rustaceans may already be familiar with Read Rust 2018. It’s really awesome to see all blog posts by other people. I’m yet to finish reading all of them :P Adding to the chain of wishlist and suggestions for Rust’s roadmap for 2018, here’s my Wishlist:
